de.ailis.usb4java.jni

Class USB_Descriptor_Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.jni.USB_Descriptor_Header
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    USB_Config_Descriptor, USB_Device_Descriptor, USB_Endpoint_Descriptor, USB_Interface_Descriptor, USB_String_Descriptor

    public abstract class USB_Descriptor_Header
extends Object
    All standard descriptors have the two fields bLength and bDescriptorType in common. So this base class implements them.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)

      • getUSBClassName

        protected static String getUSBClassName(int usbClass)
        Returns the name of the specified USB class. "unknown" is returned for a class which is unknown to libusb.
        Parameters:
        usbClass - The numeric USB class.
        Returns:
        The USB class name.

      • decodeBCD

        protected static String decodeBCD(int bcd)
        Decodes a binary-coded decimal into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        bcd - The binary-coded decimal to decode.
        Returns:
        The decoded binary-coded decimal.

      • toHexDump

        protected static String toHexDump(ByteBuffer bytes,
               int columns)
        Returns a hex dump of the specified byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes to dump.
        columns - The number of columns in the hex dump.
        Returns:
        The hex dump.
